name: ExportYourStore
author: ExportYourStore

sections.description:
ExportYourStore is the easiest solution to export and sync your products from any marketplace with the most simple, advanced ready-to-go automation.

List and sync your WooCommerce products to the largest online marketplaces like Amazon, eBay and Walmart.

Already a multi-channel seller? Keep your WooCommerce store in sync with the rest of your business and import products from eBay, Etsy, Shopify and more.

To easily connect your WooCommerce store to ExportYourStore, download this plugin, install and enable it in your WordPress admin page.

Export and Sync with full automation

  1. Choose your hub of operation, manage your products on your preferred platform.
  2. Automatically list products across all your channels with seamless integration.
  3. Automatically sync inventory availability – no overselling guaranteed!

The plugin will automatically create the correct API keys to connect ExportYourStore with your WooCommerce store.

Learn about ExportYourStore’s terms of service
sections.installation:
1. Upload the exportyourstore folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory or alternatively upload the exportyourstore.zip file via the plugin page of WordPress by clicking ‘Add New’ and selecting the zip from your computer.
  2. Activate the ExportYourStore WordPress plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Now that the plugin is activated, you will see ExportYourStore as an option in your WordPress sidebar. Select “ExportYourStore” to go to the connection page and click “Connect to ExportYourStore”

More info
